website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Live 500BT wireless headphones support Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant voice control and deliver powerful, bass-forward audio.
pros: Powerful bass depth and crisp, sculpted highs
App includes adjustable EQ and ambient listening modes
Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant support
cons: Voice assistance requires pressing a button
Controls could be easier to operate

customer_reviews.title: A Brilliant Durable product with quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I am very very pleased with these headphones. I love the the talk through and ambient sounds awareness features and they do work a treat. To get the best out of this product, you must download the JBL headphones App. The quality of sound using the app is Immense. I truly enjoyed listening to music with these, they are just brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound let down by the design
customer_reviews.text: The casing on the headphones gives the impression of really cheap plastic and noise comes through really bad as soon as anything touches them. Especially noticeable while running because the power button rattles every time you move. IT'S SO FRUSTRATING because if the design was better with the housing for the headphones these would be a easy 5 stars. The design of them really lets down how good the quality is of the actual speakers next to your ears. Snug fit but looks great. Every thing is here in principle just let down in execution. Sad to say that I have to return these but really over priced for the quality you get from them.
customer_reviews.author: O. Pooley

customer_reviews.title: Constant bluetooth problems
customer_reviews.text: I use them on my phone and computer and constantly have to deal with sound coming only from one ear, being unable to connect, connection without any sound, random disconecting and reconecting in the middle of a youtube playlist. Yes the design is great, yes the quality is amazing, they're even able to cancel out a lot of noise. BUT it all doesn't matter if they can't connect properly! My boyfriend has the 650BT - same issues, so it's not really a faulty item.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a long flight to Thailand . You can still hear a background noise from the aeroplane but I couldn’t hear my husband talking who was sat next to me. They were everything we wanted them to be and would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: You won't go wrong with JBL. Fantastic product. Got it from Amazon ("Like New" product) for an unbelievable price. The best headphones I've used so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Cipriano

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuting and media consumption
customer_reviews.text: As a little background, I have a degree in Audio Engineering and work within a production environment. As a pair of casual listening headphones for on the go, these are well worth the price while giving you additional features. I have some gripes with the JBL app having the worst E.Q. functionality I have ever seen. Perfect for your commute into work or just casual media consumption.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones, got it for my daughter and it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the headphones because they have a good sound and are very comfortable to wear. I have an industrial earpiercing and I can easily wear this for long time without hurting the piercing. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Nathanja

customer_reviews.title: Covering on the earmuffs comes away very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a present for my dad. Paying so much money for the headphones I expected a different experience. My dad had these only for 5 months and the covering on the earmuffs came away. For this price, wouldn't recommend purchasing this product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality good, product quality not great.
customer_reviews.text: The leather/material covering the earmuff comes away from the headphones over time. This is the second part that has done this and it is not good. Good sound but lacking quality of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Healey

customer_reviews.title: music sounds very good, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Are tight and very rigid, heavy, the music sounds very good, looks very good
customer_reviews.author: Suhan Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well and the sound quality is great, I'm hearing instruments in songs that I didmy know we're even there!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Morrissy

customer_reviews.title: Batteries not working
customer_reviews.text: This pair of headphones would be a 5 star however when I got the headphones the charging doesn’t work which was sad but I still use it wired if anyone know who I can contact to get this issue fix that will be greatly appreciated
customer_reviews.author: mekdes k.

customer_reviews.title: True to its Ad
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best phone in the world but JBL does a good job with the sound quality and comfort while running and exercising with the headphone. It's a good purchase. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Suellen Massuci Zapp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, ambient aware is an brilliant feature great for out on the road. Fit comfortably and snug. Overall very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy if on sale!
customer_reviews.text: They aren't as loud as I thought! But they have good noise cancelation
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great deal but got default pair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of headphones, got them for as a Christmas present for a family member unfortunately I got a default pair that I can’t recharge 😭
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Silvestre

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Use them for the gym, great comfort and amazing sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great, only one criticism
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price BUT my only criticism is that it's very tight on my neck when not on ears. Fir the record, my neck is a good average man's neck.
customer_reviews.author: Vahe

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good value for money, my only real issue (and this is likely me being terrible with tech) is having issues syncing it to my Samsung tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Scholten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really good, i can wear them for hours and my ears dont hurt and dosnt hurt my head from head band. Noise cancellation is good even when no sound u barely hear noise need to be taken of to have a conversation.
customer_reviews.author: kevin david

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a Christmas present I have tried them on, these headphones do not disappoint with excellent crystal sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great budget buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great budget option, enough features and overall good headphones. Worh the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using the budget brand TaoTronics bluetooth headphones, which were great at noise cancelling and had good sound quality - however, compared to these headphones, they fall well short. The noise cancellation and sound quality is far superior in these headsets. One thing to note, especially, is the much longer battery power in these - and you could easily do long-haul flights and trips away and not need to worry. I would definitely go for this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: matigrebooks

customer_reviews.title: JBL Wireless Headphones Tick All The Boxes
customer_reviews.text: JBL is a decent brand in the field of speakers and sonic delivery equipment, and this pair of Bluetooth / wireless speakers effortlessly ticks all the boxes. Before downloading the app, I simply paired it via Bluetooth on my Samsung Android phone. The sound is impressively detailes and clear, with a hearty bass throb and crisp upper mids. The headphones lend themselves to all manner of musical genres, from Dub reggae through to Schubert Leiders. Excellent headphones, and good value for money, too.
customer_reviews.author: Og Oggilby

customer_reviews.title: Music sounds awesome and comfy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: No matter what you listen too music, audiobooks or movies, the sound quality is awesome. They are very very comfortable over the ear headphones, so no squashing the ears. They look and feel lovely quality but what lets these lovely headphones down is the clicking or clacking when you move, it just drove me a tad nuts, the husband didn't mind this though. Would have given them 5 stars but for that bit.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Earcup fell off
customer_reviews.text: Broke in about 2 months, and because of the construction there's no way of assembling the ear cup back, there was some really bad glue.
customer_reviews.author: SeriousDan

product_meta.title: JBL Live 500BT Wireless Over-Ear Voice Enabled Headphones with Alexa (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Blue

JBL LIVE 500BT OVER-EAR WIRELESS EARPHONES
In your world, superior sound is essential, so grab a pair of JBL LIVE 500BT and live your best life. Stylish and comfortable fabric
headband ensures comfort as good as the sound. Use your preferred Voice Service software and enjoy the simple life. Featuring
JBL Signature Sound, that plays up to 30 hours and charges completely in just 2 hours. Use it's built-in microphone and take your
calls with a simple touch.

Product Details * Product Type: Cordless, Bluetooth over-ear headset
 * Playing Time: 30 hours of audio playing
 * Driver size: 50mm
 * Colour: Blue
 * Weight: 231.6 g
 * Charge Time: 2 hours
 * Bluetooth Version: V4.2

JBL by HarmanFor over 70 years, JBL has engineered the most precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. Harman's mission
and vision is to make life more connected, entertaining, personalized and productive. The company combines passion and purpose
to design smart products systems, software and services to connect people wherever they are.
feature_bullets: Your sound, unplugged - enjoy JBL Signature Sound in a wireless package / Your music with deep and powerful bass everywhere you go
Rechargeable, extended battery life offers up to 30 hours of uninterrupted music listening or handsfree calls / Long-lasting fun with quick recharge in just 2 hours
Impressive technologies: TalkThru lowers music and amplifies voices of people around you / AmbientAware delivers sound immersion by increasing ambient noise, so you can hear your surroundings
Fitting fabric headband and soft ear cushions designed for a comfortable musical experience all day long / Relax and let the good times roll with Alexa Voice Service or Google Assistant
Items delivered: 1x JBL LIVE 500BT On Ear Earphones in Blue / Aux Cable / Warranty Card / Charging cable
Alexa built-in devices let you instantly connect to Alexa to play music, control your smart home, get information, news, weather, and more using just your voice.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
